positions.title: Engineering Lead
responsibilities: Lead NYC team in coordination with Sydney, Australia team
Implemented complex search & filter page with React Hooks
Improved search API with Flask, SQLAlchemy, & Marshmallow
Rebuilt enterprise-facing dashboard for improved usability & stability

positions.title: Senior Front-End Engineer
responsibilities: Architected & lead the front-end development of B2B platform to comply with pay equity laws
Refactored unstable multi-step onboarding flow, improving app stability and performance
Enforced React/Redux & TypeScript best practices through regular peer code review
Implemented charting and graphing with Victory library

positions.title: Engineer
responsibilities: Developed MVP patient care app with Node.js, Express, Passport, and Objection.js
Managed product lifecycle, feature triage, & AWS deployments
Integrated API tests with supertest & Jest, enabling rapid iteration
Implemented live chat feature with Redis and websockets

positions.title: Senior Front-End Engineer
responsibilities: Junior- to mid-level in <9 months; project lead in ~2.5 years; account lead in 3 years
Managed team of developers across multiple projects and brands for L’Oréal account
Lead development team on agile ecommerce project built with Vue.js and Sitecore
Architected Hybris checkout for stability and performance with Redux, Handlebars, and Kefir
Redesigned product page using vanilla JavaScript and component-based architecture

positions.title: Social Media Manager
responsibilities: Managed social media accounts for multiple brands
Built a replicable, automatable weekly report in JavaScript with Highcharts to aid monitoring of social media and web content metrics
Developed and assisted in maintaining WordPress-based website, implementing YouTube integration to aid channel cleanup
Migrated WordPress site to Composer-based Bedrock stack for simplified full-site management
Integrated DeployHQ and Bitbucket to facilitate automatic deployments to both staging and production sites
